nl.weeaboo.vn.image

Interface IImageModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDestructible, IModule, IPrefsChangeListener, IRenderEnvConsumer, IResourceCache, IResourceResolver, IUpdateable, java.io.Serializable

    public interface IImageModule
extends IModule, IResourceResolver
    Module for images and rendering.

      • getTexture

        @Nullable
ITexture getTexture(ResourceLoadInfo path,
                               boolean suppressErrors)
        Attempts to load the texture with the specified filename.
        Parameters:
        path - Filename of the requested resource and related metadata.
        suppressErrors - If true doesn't log any errors that may occur.
        Returns:
        The texture, or null if loading failed.

      • getNinePatch

        @Nullable
INinePatch getNinePatch(ResourceLoadInfo path,
                                   boolean suppressErrors)
        Attempts to load a ninepatch based on the specified filename.
        Parameters:
        path - Filename of the requested resource and related metadata.
        suppressErrors - If true doesn't log any errors that may occur.
        Returns:
        The ninepatch, or null if loading failed.

      • getColorTexture

        ITexture getColorTexture(int argb)
        Creates a solid-color texture with the given color.

      • createTexture

        ITexture createTexture(ITextureData texData,
                       double scaleX,
                       double scaleY)
        Creates a texture from the given image data. The scaleX and scaleY factors scale from pixel coordinates to the coordinates of image state.

      • createTexture

        ITexture createTexture(IScreenshot ss)
        Creates a texture from a screenshot.

      • getImageFiles

        java.util.Collection<nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath> getImageFiles(nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath folder)
        Returns the paths for all image files in the specified folder and its sub-folders.

      • setImageResolution

        void setImageResolution(nl.weeaboo.common.Dim desiredSize)
        Changes the desired image resolution (width x height). Images are loaded from the resource folder that most closely matches the desired size.

      • screenshot

        IScreenshot screenshot()
        Schedules a screenshot of the root layer for the active context. Use IAsyncRenderTask.isAvailable() and/or IAsyncRenderTask.isFailed() to find out the state of the returned screenshot object.
        See Also:
        screenshot(ILayer, short, boolean, boolean)

      • screenshot

        IScreenshot screenshot(ILayer layer,
                       short z,
                       boolean isVolatile,
                       boolean clipEnabled)
        Schedules a screenshot of the given layer. Use IAsyncRenderTask.isAvailable() and/or IAsyncRenderTask.isFailed() to find out the state of the returned screenshot object.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to take the screenshot in. Any layers beneath this layer will also be visible.
        z - The z-index at which to take the screenshot. Any objects in front of this z index will not be visible.
        isVolatile - If true, the pixels of the screenshot will be stored in volatile GPU memory only.
        clipEnabled - If true, honor the layer's clipping bounds. If false, a screenshot of the entire visible screen will be taken instead.

      • preload

        void preload(nl.weeaboo.filesystem.FilePath filename)
        Suggests to the resource loader that the image with the given filename should be preloaded into memory.
        Parameters:
        filename - Path to the image file.
